detail_desc: Shopper in grained imitation leather with two handles at the top, a magnetic press-stud fastening, one inner compartment and one outer compartment. Unlined. Size 15x35x35 cm.
Hard plastic smartphone case with a selfie light in two places. Built-in battery. USB 2.0 charging cable included. Fits iPhone 6/7. The cable is only for charging and synchronisation via a computer.
Running top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with short raglan sleeves, hole-patterned sections at the sides and reflective details.
Low-rise leggings in stretch imitation leather with quilted details on the knees. Fake pockets with decorative zips, and a visible zip fastening at the front.
Baseball jacket in woven fabric with a sheen. Appliqué on the front, a small, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is organic.
Blouse in a soft weave with a narrow collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Double-layered hat in soft, rib-knit cotton jersey with a small appliqué on the front.
Short-sleeved wrapover blouse in linen with a deep V-neck and buttons at the front, adjustable safety buttons at one side and ties at the other. Seam at the waist and a peplum.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and cutaway coverage at the back.
Bolero in a soft fine knit containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves.
Double-layered sports top in fast-drying functional fabric and mesh with a print motif on the front, racer back and cap sleeves.
Rigid hairband made of covered steel wire with fabric flowers and leaves.
3/4-length, slim-fit jeans in soft stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and inset lace sections at the hems.
Shirt in cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a fold-down shaft and soft terry inside.

Set with a pair of dungarees and a long-sleeved top in soft organic cotton jersey. Dungarees with concealed press-studs at the crotch, straps with a button on the shoulders,a kangaroo pocket with printed appliqués, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Top with lapped shoulders and long-sleeves.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with a slight sheen. Print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with long sleeves with slits at the cuffs, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a rounded hem. Unlined.
V-neck tunic in a cool, softly draping viscose weave with a stand-up collar, buttons down the front and narrow ties under the bust. Gathered yoke at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Fitted blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Sweetheart neckline and a gathered seam at the top, a concealed zip in one side and short puff sleeves that are elasticated at the shoulders and hems. Partly lined.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in organic cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, zip at the top, appliqués on the chest and slits in the sides.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Narrow belt in imitation leather with a metal buckle. Width 2.5 cm.
Top in block-coloured sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Slim-fit, denim-look leggings in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist.
Cold shoulder top in soft jersey with a flounce at the top, narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves. Loose fit with smocking at the hem.
Bras in microfibre with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide extra-firm support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.

Long-sleeved jumpsuit in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck and a wrapover front with a hook-and-eye fastening. Elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist and straight, wide legs.
Fitted, scoop-necked T-shirt in stretch jersey with a sheen.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Baby Exclusive. Textured-knit wool jumper with long raglan sleeves, buttons at the back and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved waffled jersey top made from a cotton blend in a relaxed fit. Bleached pattern at the bottom and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in jersey made from a modal blend with a mid, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey containing some linen with short sleeves, a seam centre back and rounded hem.

Quilted puffer gilet in woven fabric with a filling of 70 % recycled down and 30 % recycled feathers from Re:Down®. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, and welt front pockets with a concealed press-stud.
Microfibre leggings with an elasticated waist and lace trims at the hems.

Short-sleeved shirt and pair of shorts in woven fabric. Shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a grandad collar and buttons down the front. Shorts in Tencel™ lyocell with an adjustable, elasticated waist and fake fly.

Chinos in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Sleeveless top in soft organic cotton jersey with a tie detail at the hem.

5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and skinny legs. Shaping – denim with a stretch function that holds in and shapes the waist, thighs and bum while keeping the jeans in shape.
5-pocket regular fit trousers in cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Short-sleeved T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets, and flared legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with raw, roll edges around the sleeves and hem.
T-shirt in soft viscose jersey with visible seams, a wide neckline and rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Sports top in fast-drying mesh with dropped shoulders, long sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and rounded hems.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a lace yoke, buttons and gathers at the top and elasticated cuffs. Rounded and longer at the back.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Scarf in a soft weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Polo-neck jumper in a soft mohair blend with dropped shoulders and long trumpet sleeves.
Briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Long-sleeved top in printed cotton jersey.
Loose-fitting trousers in soft fleece with covered elastication at the waist and hems.
Top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a motif. Press-studs at the back, long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey with an angular neckline and short sleeves.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Lined triangle bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Metal fastener at the back.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, stretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.

Set with a short-sleeved football top and football shorts in fast-drying functional fabric. Top with a print motif front and back. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and print motifs on the legs.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Cropped top in crinkled jersey with short puff sleeves that have narrow elastication at the hems and an opening at the back with ties at the hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and double elasticated crossover straps front and back. High-cut at the back.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Short polo-neck top in viscose jersey with long sleeves.
Calf-length, bell-shaped skirt in an airy, textured pima cotton weave. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Jumper in a soft knit with visible seams at the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbed roll edges at the cuffs and hem.
Block-striped jumper in a fine knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Bell-shaped skirt in cotton corduroy with an adjustable, elasticated waist and press-studs down the front. Unlined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with buttons on one shoulder and long sleeves.
Joggers in a cashmere knit with an elasticated drawstring waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Thong briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist and lined gusset. The cotton content of the briefs is organic.
Wide, off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Elastication and a wide flounce at the top.
